remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口用于提供应用程序的自定义安全证书验证。The interface is used to provide custom security certificate validation for an application. 默认策略是允许的有效证书，以及已过期的有效证书。The default policy is to allow valid certificates, as well as valid certificates that have expired. 若要更改此策略，实现接口使用不同的策略，并将该策略应用到。To change this policy, implement the interface with a different policy, and then assign that policy to . 使用安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI)。 uses the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的 SSPI 文档。For more information, see the SSPI documentation on MSDN. ## Examples 下面的示例创建证书策略返回`false`的证书问题，并输出一条消息，指示在控制台上的出现问题。The following example creates a certificate policy that returns `false` for any certificate problem and prints a message that indicates the problem on the console. CertificateProblem 枚举定义的证书问题的 SSPI 常量和私有 GetProblemMessage 方法创建可打印消息有关的问题。The CertificateProblem enum defines SSPI constants for certificate problems, and the private GetProblemMessage method creates a printable message about the problem. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现应用程序证书验证策略。The method implements the application certificate validation policy. 此方法可以检查`srvPoint`， `certificate`， `request`，和`certificateProblem`参数，以确定是否应遵守此证书。The method can examine the `srvPoint`, `certificate`, `request`, and `certificateProblem` parameters to determine whether the certificate should be honored. `certificateProblem`参数是安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI) 状态代码。The `certificateProblem` parameter is a Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) status code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的 SSPI 文档。For more information, see the SSPI documentation on MSDN.
